subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tales of Drazen Petrovic, the brash gunslinger who starred for the Yugoslav national team, were legend in the Balkan states, and many were passed down to the Cavaliers’ Sasha Pavlovic.
snippet: Tales of Drazen Petrovic, the brash gunslinger who starred for the Yugoslav national team, were legend in the Balkan states, and many were passed down to the Cavaliers’ Sasha Pavlovic.
